name: DefaultAbstractLinkedListForJava21Test
description: Unit tests for the DefaultAbstractLinkedListForJava21 class, focusing on various operations like adding, removing, and sublist manipulations.

nested_classes.name: DefaultAbstractLinkedListForJava21
nested_classes.description: Internal class extending AbstractLinkedListForJava21 with serialization methods.

test_cases.name: testAddNodeAfter
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of adding a node after a specified node in the list.

test_cases.name: testGetNode
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of retrieving nodes from the list and handling index out of bounds exceptions.

test_cases.name: testRemoveFirst
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of removing the first element from the list.

test_cases.name: testRemoveLast
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of removing the last element from the list.

test_cases.name: testRemoveNode
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of removing a specific node from the list.

test_cases.name: testSubList
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of creating and using sublists from the main list.

test_cases.name: testSubListAddBegin
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of adding elements to the beginning of a sublist.

test_cases.name: testSubListAddEnd
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of adding elements to the end of a sublist.

test_cases.name: testSubListAddMiddle
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of adding elements to the middle of a sublist.

test_cases.name: testSubListRemove
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of removing elements from a sublist.
